name: The Clone Age
description:
Welcome to The Clone Age! The year is 2093 and Bob just created the world's first human cloning machine, but it seems to work too well! Can you make it to the top floor and shut it off in time? Post your best times in the comments!

Use WASD to move and ESC to exit. 

This game was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 63: Future.

Either play it directly in the browser or download a standalone version below!
